My Projects

School Management System

School management system using PHP and MySQL is a web-based application. Student Management Project is software that is helpful for students as well as the school authorities. In the current system, all the activities are done manually. It is very time-consuming and costly. Our online School Management System in PHP deals with the various activities related to the teachers and students.

Home Screen

Project Requirements Project Name : School Management System in php Language Used : PHP5.6, PHP7.x Database : MySQL 5.x User Interface Design : HTML, AJAX,JQUERY,JAVASCRIPT Web Browser : Mozilla, Google Chrome, IE8, OPERA Software : XAMPP / Wamp / Mamp/ Lamp (anyone)

Login Screen

School Management System Project Modules The three main users involved in this system are User(i.e. Students) Admin Teachers

Admin Module Screen

The admin module in a school management system serves as the central hub for overseeing and managing all administrative functions. It is designed to streamline operations, enhance efficiency, and ensure seamless communication between various stakeholders, including administrators, teachers, students, and parents. The module typically includes features such as student enrollment and record management, staff management, attendance tracking, timetable scheduling, and fee management. Administrators can also generate reports, monitor academic progress, and manage school resources through this module. With robust security measures and user-friendly interfaces, the admin module ensures that sensitive data is protected while providing easy access to essential tools for effective school administration. By automating routine tasks and offering real-time updates, the admin module significantly reduces manual workload, allowing administrators to focus on strategic decision-making and improving the overall educational experience.

Student Module Screen

The student module in a school management system is a dedicated platform designed to empower students by providing them with easy access to their academic and personal information. This module serves as a one-stop solution for students to view their class schedules, attendance records, exam results, and assignment deadlines. It also facilitates communication with teachers and peers, enabling students to stay updated on course materials, announcements, and school events. Additionally, the student module often includes features like online submission of assignments, access to digital learning resources, and progress tracking tools to help students monitor their academic performance. With a user-friendly interface and mobile compatibility, the module ensures that students can stay connected and engaged with their education anytime, anywhere. By promoting transparency and fostering self-management, the student module plays a crucial role in enhancing the learning experience and supporting students in achieving their academic goals.

Teacher Module Screen

The teacher module in a school management system is a comprehensive tool designed to support educators in managing their daily tasks and enhancing the teaching-learning process. This module provides teachers with access to essential features such as attendance management, gradebook functionality, lesson planning, and assignment creation. It allows teachers to track student progress, record grades, and generate performance reports efficiently. Additionally, the module facilitates communication with students and parents, enabling teachers to share updates, feedback, and important announcements. With tools for creating and distributing digital learning materials, scheduling exams, and managing classroom activities, the teacher module helps streamline administrative tasks, allowing educators to focus more on teaching and student engagement.
